name: microcosmically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has the same characteristics as something larger: What is true microcosmically is also true macrocosmically. Microcosmically, water is your blood, and macrocosmically it is the vast network of seas and rivers that traverse the planet.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is always a temptation to consider the game of chess microcosmically; to see the conflict on the board as a symbolic version of war.This huge destructive force begins microcosmically in her own heart.
